thread.title: Illustrations That Capture The Sweet Little Moments Living With A Cat
thread.title_full: Illustrations That Capture The Sweet Little Moments Living With A Cat

author: Sally White
title: Illustrations That Capture The Sweet Little Moments Living With A Cat
text:
Illustrations of Sweet Moments From Living With a Cat Life with a furry feline is far from dull. Challenging, unpredictable, full of kitty litter and cat hair, yes, but definitely never boring.  Every person has their favorite crazy cat story, but itâ€™s those unforgettable tender moments that grab you and remind you why having a cat in your life is worthwhile. Just in case the rhythmic purr that warms your heart is not reason enough, here are a series of illustrations from talented artist Yasmin Surovec of CatVersusHuman.com capturing the sweet moments and life lessons that only come from living with a cat.


Featured photo credit: Yasmin Surovec at CatVersusHuman.com via boredpanda.com 
The post Illustrations That Capture The Sweet Little Moments Living With A Cat appeared first on Lifehack .
